name: Variable Danger
description:
Test version of Variable Danger

  • arrows to move around and aim the bullets
  • space bar to jump or go through floors with down arrow held
  • Z to bring up the save/load dialog
  • The game does not autosave. The dialog lies!
  • D and F to change variable numbers
  • E and R to change variable numbers x10
  • F to fire
  • S to unlock panels
  • Q to add tons of score and W to double your score, cheat buttons ;P
  • Numbers and panels aren't balanced so cheat as much as you want

Planned changes:

  • the art is going to change
  • sound effects will be added
  • a tutorial
  • different fighting arenas
  • way more variables to screw with
